* [.ac-gn-menuicon-bread .ac-gn-menuicon-bread-top]##[.ac-gn-menuicon-bread-crust .ac-gn-menuicon-bread-crust-top]####[.ac-gn-menuicon-bread .ac-gn-menuicon-bread-bottom]##[.ac-gn-menuicon-bread-crust .ac-gn-menuicon-bread-crust-bottom]####link:#ac-gn-menustate[[.ac-gn-menuanchor-label]#Global
Nav Open Menu#]link:#[[.ac-gn-menuanchor-label]#Global Nav Close Menu#]
* https://www.apple.com/uk/[[.ac-gn-link-text]#Apple#]
* {blank}
+

https://www.apple.com/uk/shop/goto/bag[[.ac-gn-link-text]#Shopping
Bag#][.ac-gn-bag-badge]##[.ac-gn-bag-badge-separator]####[.ac-gn-bag-badge-number]####[.ac-gn-bag-badge-unit]#+###

[[app]]
[[howto-section]]
[[content]]
[[howto-title]]
== Apple security updates (2010)

For the protection of our customers, Apple does not disclose, discuss or
confirm security issues until a full investigation has occurred and any
necessary patches or releases are available. To learn more about Apple
Product Security, see the Apple
http://www.apple.com/support/security/[Product Security website].

This article has been archived and is no longer updated by Apple.

[[sections]]
*Important*: This document describes updates and releases from 2010
only.

* For information about releases in 2011 and later, see
http://support.apple.com/kb/HT1222[this article].
* For information about releases in 2008 and 2009, see
http://support.apple.com/kb/HT4218[this article].
* For information about releases in 2005, 2006, and 2007, see
http://support.apple.com/kb/HT1263[this article].

===  +
Obtaining Mac OS X

Information about obtaining Mac OS X (client) can be found
http://www.apple.com/macosx/[here]. Information about obtaining OS X
Server can be found http://www.apple.com/server/macosx/[here].

Software updates for Mac OS X are available via:

* http://support.apple.com/kb/HT1338[Software Update] preferences
* http://www.apple.com/support/downloads/[Apple Downloads]

===  +
Apple Product Security PGP Key

For information, see http://support.apple.com/kb/HT1620[How to use the
Apple Product Security PGP Key].

=== Security updates

[[tableWraper]]
[width="100%",cols="34%,33%,33%",]
|===
a|

*Released for*

a|
*Release date*

with 802.11n, Time Capsule a|

*Important:* Information about products not manufactured by Apple is
provided for information purposes only and does not constitute Apple’s
recommendation or endorsement. Please
http://support.apple.com/kb/HT2693?viewlocale=en_US[contact the vendor]
for additional information.
